DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine effect 4 Hz 110 Hz transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation sympathetic nervous system via measure sympathetic skin response ( SSR ) skin temperature .
DOC.brief_title: Effects High Low Frequency TENS Sympathetic Skin Response Skin Temperature
DOC.detailed_description: 15 healthy subject ( 8 female , 7 male ) mean age 22.6 Â± 3.7 year participate study . All subject participate , randomly , 4 Hz TENS session , 110 Hz TENS session , control ( off-TENS ) session . Each session consist 20- minute stimulation period 10-minute follow period . Outcome measure : Sympathetic skin response simulate ( Right ) hand skin temperature stimulate ( Right ) none stimulate ( Left ) hand measure 15 second , 15 second , 10 minute application intervention .
DOC.criteria: Men woman age 18 30 year History cardiovascular , neurologic musculoskeletal disease Taking medication time study
DOC.keyword: TENS , sympathetic skin response , skin temperature
